name: Atavism—Character Creation Quick Start Guide
description:
Darkness is out there, my friends, believe it.  But there's also light—and those who stand.

Atavism is a tabletop roleplaying game for 2-6 players  about the return of long-forgotten abilities and a group of ordinary people who stand against the demons which haunt the modern world. 

Atavism uses a narrative-driven d6 dice system which takes inspiration from The Wildsea, Blades in the Dark, and Fate. Create deep and varied characters with a character creation system inspired by the games of Jenna Moran and Vampire: The Masquerade. Portray mediums, firestarters, savants, or just plain ol everyday people who refuse to bow to evil. 

This copy of the Atavism—Character Creation Quick Start Guide is your way to try out the thrilling supernatural RPG prior to release. If you are interested in finding a group to play with, join our Discord: https://discord.gg/Yuzrn38H

Remember to subscribe in order to receive updated versions of this guide—and for news of the game's release.
